author: costin
msg: - Fixed apache2.0 connector to work with the latest Apache 2.0 ( they
replaced ap_context back with ap_pool )
- Added Makefile.linux - we'll have to build a configure or something
better, now you have to edit the file, etc
- Added the right hook for linux ( child_init instead of post_config)
- separate the "marshalling" code out of ajp23 ( now it's in jk_msg_buf)

author: mandar
msg: Bug fix for #248:
"extends" attribute of page directive results in uncompilable source code
Fix is to use getClassLoader() method on the generated servlet class
instead of using the HttpJspBase.getClassLoader() thus removing the
dependency on the super-class.

author: craigmcc
msg: Disallow shutdowns of Tomcat unless the client connection was made from
the same IP address as the server.  Otherwise, anyone who peruses the
Tomcat source code can easily figure out how to shut it down remotely.
NOTE:  The hokiness of the patch is a workaround to a bug in the IBM 1.1.8
JVM for Linux, which returns the bytes of the InetAddress backwards on one
of the two addresses retrieved from a Socket -- rendering the "equals"
test that was proposed not useful.
Submitted by:	wjm@metronet.com
